thread.section_title: Hotel le Tourville - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Paris
thread.title_full: Paris - Review of Hotel le Tourville, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Christopher R
title: Paris
text: This hotel was amazing for my wife, 2 teenage children and I while spending spring break in Paris. The hotel was clean and the front desk service was impeccable. The recommendations given for restaurants was spot on. The location was ideal. A 5 minute walk to the Eiffel Tower and a 2 minute walk to Ecole Miltiare metro stop as well as 1 block walk to Les Invalides. Mauricio was so helpful the entire trip and arrange car service to Charles de Gaulle for us. I would highly recommend this hotel. The rooms were very nice. Like Most of Europe we needed 2 rooms for the 4 of us but the furnishings were modern. The hotel provided each room with a cellphone with free data and phone calls while in France which let us communicate easily and navigate directions.
